title: Command to enable/disable deprecated APIs
description: The **deprecations** RPC command is used to override global config option `allow-deprecated-apis` for further RPC commands on this same connection. This can be useful for developer testing to ensure you don't accidentally rely on deprecated features.
Flag to enable or disable deprecated APIs. Setting it to `false` will neither accept deprecated parameters or commands, nor output deprecated fields.
